section.text: In the case of removal of residence of any elective officer from the territorial limits of the City, such removal shall, ipso facto, create a vacancy in his office.

In the case of removal of residence of any officer elected to represent a specific electoral district from the electoral district for the representation of which he was elected, such removal shall, ipso facto, create a vacancy in his office. (S.L. 1953, Ch. 347, Art. 2; S.L. 1973, Ch. 319, §1(m))
